text: AI21 has general purpose language models
and also Task-Specific Models

that are really good at
particular tasks like

summarization, grounded
question answering,
paraphrasing and so on.
We're training these foundation models

and an important part is to
make sure they produce harmless,
truthful information.

It's always important to
have human validation, kind

of human in the loop that
helps you steer the models
towards the right direction.

So we've partnered with Amazon
Ground Truth to make sure
that our models can actually align
with human preferences.

We're using SageMaker Ground
Truth in order to curate
and label high quality data.
We provide some requests around what kinds
of data do we need to improve our models
and the AWS take care of the rest in terms

of quality control and the,
the scale of the operation.

The work with AWS so far
has been just phenomenal
and I very much look forward to see how it
evolves from here.
